name: Manual Brewing 101 Workshop
description:
Ace the art of manual brewing with this workshop!   


In this carefully curated session, Blue Tokai’s in-house trainers will take you through the basics of brewing coffee at home, as well as the science behind pouring the perfect cup, every time!    


Whether you’re a beginner or an expert brewer, sign up for this workshop and join our community of coffee lovers!   


Workshop Highlights   


- Learn the basics of specialty coffee.     - Understand different manual brewing techniques.    


Date:  7th February 2026 [Saturday]    


Venue:   Blue Tokai Coffee Roasters | Neeladri Road, Electronic city, Bangalore

Date:  8th February 2026 [Sunday]    


Venue:   Blue Tokai Coffee Roasters | Model Town



Timings: 11 am onwards   


 Please note that the tickets for this event are non-refundable and you cannot transfer your ticket to a future event. To ensure a smooth start, the workshop will commence 15 minutes after the scheduled time.
